QuestData.Title: Do Your Worst
QuestData.Description: You're going to use this machine against the Scourge? You're not going to win against them like that.$B$BYou can destroy hundreds... even thousands of them. But you won't win. Not out here.$B$BWhen you're done playing with your machine, meet me to the north. There is an old army encampment. What I will show you will teach you a little bit about who you're up against.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Refurbished Demolisher to destroy 150 Decomposed Ghouls, 20 Frostskull Mages and 2 Bone Giants in the Valley of Lost Hope. Speak to Matthias Lehner at the First Legion Forward Camp when you've completed this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you done playing with your war machines?
QuestData.RewardText: You see? You killed your fair share, but for every one you destroyed, another rose from the dirt to take its place.$B$BYou don't know what you're up against, $n. Let me show you.
